titles.title: To authorize disaster recovery assistance for areas affected by wildfires on Federal Lands, and for other purposes.
Federal Lands Fire-Related Incidents Recovery and Economic Stimulus Act of 2018
Federal Lands Fire-Related Incidents Recovery and Economic Stimulus Act of 2018
Federal Lands FIRES Act of 2018
Federal Lands FIRES Act of 2018
Federal Lands FIRES Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, and Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
